com.ibm.team.enterprise.scd.common.api

Interface IScdPropertyFactory


  • public interface IScdPropertyFactory

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEPENDENCY_FILE_TYPE
      The SCD property name of for the file type property used by RTC dependency build
      static java.lang.String DEPENDENCY_LOGICAL_NAME
      The SCD property name of for the logical name property used by RTC dependency build
      static java.lang.String DEPENDENCY_NAMESPACE
      Namespace used by all RTC dependency build properties
      static java.lang.String DEPENDENCY_PATH
      The SCD property name of for the build file path property used by RTC dependency build
      static java.lang.String DEPENDENCY_PROPERTY_NAME
      The SCD property name of for the dependency property used by RTC dependency build
      static java.lang.String DEPENDENCY_REFERENCE_TYPE
      The SCD property name of for the reference type property used by RTC dependency build
      static java.lang.String SCM_NAMESPACE
      Namespace for SCM properties created by the RTC scan process.

    • Field Detail

      • DEPENDENCY_NAMESPACE

        static final java.lang.String DEPENDENCY_NAMESPACE
        Namespace used by all RTC dependency build properties
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SCM_NAMESPACE

        static final java.lang.String SCM_NAMESPACE
        Namespace for SCM properties created by the RTC scan process. SCM properties are read only. Attemping to remove or modify an SCM property will result in an IllegalOperationException being thrown
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEPENDENCY_PROPERTY_NAME

        static final java.lang.String DEPENDENCY_PROPERTY_NAME
        The SCD property name of for the dependency property used by RTC dependency build
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        static final java.lang.String DEPENDENCY_LOGICAL_NAME
        The SCD property name of for the logical name property used by RTC dependency build
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • createPropertyFile

        IScdPropertyFile createPropertyFile(com.ibm.team.filesystem.common.IFileItemHandle file)
        Creates an SCD property file for a given file
        Parameters:
        file - The file the SCD properties are to be added to; must not be null
        Returns:
        An SCD property file with an empty list of properties
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if required arguments are null
        Since:
        6.0.1

      • createBooleanProperty

        IScdProperty createBooleanProperty(java.lang.String namespace,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 boolean value)
        Create an SCD property of type Boolean
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace of the property; must not be null and be a valid URI (see RFC 2396) and must end with "/"
        name - The name of the property; must not be null
        value - The value of the property
        Returns:
        An IScdProperty of type Boolean
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if required arguments are null
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the property is a read-only property. See SCM_NAMESPACE.
        Since:
        6.0.1

      • createBooleanScanProperty

        IScdProperty createBooleanScanProperty(java.lang.String namespace,
                                     java.lang.String name,
                                     boolean value)
        Create an SCD scan property of type Boolean. Scan properties are deleted at the beginning of the RTC scan process when a file is scanned and will be replaced by new properties created during scanning.
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace of the property; must not be null and be a valid URI (see RFC 2396) and must end with "/"
        name - The name of the property; must not be null
        value - The value of the property
        Returns:
        An IScdProperty of type Boolean
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if required arguments are null
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the property is a read-only property. See SCM_NAMESPACE.
        Since:
        6.0.1

        IScdProperty createPropertyListScanProperty(java.lang.String namespace,
                                          java.lang.String name,
                                          java.util.List<IScdProperty> value)
        Create an SCD scan property that contains a list of Scd properties as the type. Scan properties are deleted at the beginning of the RTC scan process when a file is scanned and will be replaced by new properties created during scanning.
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace of the property; must not be null and be a valid URI (see RFC 2396) and must end with "/"

        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the property is a read-only property. See SCM_NAMESPACE.
        Since:
        6.0.1

      • createDependencyProperty

        IScdProperty createDependencyProperty(java.lang.String dependencyFileType,
                                    java.lang.String dependencyLogicalName,
                                    java.lang.String dependencyPath,
                                    java.lang.String dependencyReferenceType)
        Creates an SCD property in the format used by RTC dependency build to calculate dependency impacts that determine when a program is to be rebuilt.
        Parameters:
        dependencyFileType - The dependency's file type, i.e. INCL, PROC, PSB, etc.
        dependencyLogicalName - The dependency's logical name. This will be matched to the logicalName of an INCL file.
        dependencyPath - The dependency's path. For zOS files, this is the DD Name.
        dependencyReferenceType - The dependency's reference type, i.e. COPY, SQL INCLUDE, MACRO, etc.
        Returns:
        An IScdProperty in the format used by RTC dependency build to calculate dependency impacts
        Since:
        6.0.1

      • createDependencyProperty

        IScdProperty createDependencyProperty(java.lang.String dependencyFileType,
                                    java.lang.String dependencyLogicalName,
                                    java.lang.String dependencyPath,
                                    java.lang.String dependencyReferenceType,
                                    java.util.List<IScdProperty> additionalDependencyProperties)
        Creates an SCD property in the format used by RTC dependency build to calculate dependency impacts that determine when a program is to be rebuilt.
        Parameters:
        dependencyFileType - The dependency's file type, i.e. INCL, PROC, PSB, etc.
        dependencyLogicalName - The dependency's logical name. This will be matched to the logicalName of an INCL file.
        dependencyPath - The dependency's path. For zOS files, this is the DD Name.
        dependencyReferenceType - The dependency's reference type, i.e. COPY, SQL INCLUDE, MACRO, etc.
        additionalDependencyProperties - Additional dependency properties. Properties not used by RTC dependency build.
        Returns:
        An IScdProperty in the format used by RTC dependency build to calculate dependency impacts
        Since:
        6.0.1

      • createScanDependencyProperty

        IScdProperty createScanDependencyProperty(java.lang.String dependencyFileType,
                                        java.lang.String dependencyLogicalName,
                                        java.lang.String dependencyPath,
                                        java.lang.String dependencyReferenceType)
        Creates an SCD scan property in the format used by RTC dependency build to calculate dependency impacts that determine when a program is to be rebuilt. Scan properties are deleted at the beginning of the RTC scan process when a file is scanned and will be replaced by new properties created during scanning.
        Parameters:
        dependencyFileType - The dependency's file type, i.e. INCL, PROC, PSB, etc.
        dependencyLogicalName - The dependency's logical name. This will be matched to the logicalName of an INCL file.
        dependencyPath - The dependency's path. For zOS files, this is the DD Name.
        dependencyReferenceType - The dependency's reference type, i.e. COPY, SQL INCLUDE, MACRO, etc.
        Returns:
        An IScdProperty in the format used by RTC dependency build to calculate dependency impacts
        Since:
        6.0.1

      • createScanDependencyProperty

        IScdProperty createScanDependencyProperty(java.lang.String dependencyFileType,
                                        java.lang.String dependencyLogicalName,
                                        java.lang.String dependencyPath,
                                        java.lang.String dependencyReferenceType,
                                        java.util.List<IScdProperty> additionalDependencyProperties)
        Creates an SCD scan property in the format used by RTC dependency build to calculate dependency impacts that determine when a program is to be rebuilt. Scan properties are deleted at the beginning of the RTC scan process when a file is scanned and will be replaced by new properties created during scanning.
        Parameters:
        dependencyFileType - The dependency's file type, i.e. INCL, PROC, PSB, etc.
        dependencyLogicalName - The dependency's logical name. This will be matched to the logicalName of an INCL file.
        dependencyPath - The dependency's path. For zOS files, this is the DD Name.
        dependencyReferenceType - The dependency's reference type, i.e. COPY, SQL INCLUDE, MACRO, etc.
        additionalDependencyProperties - Additional dependency properties. Properties not used by RTC dependency build.
        Returns:
        An IScdProperty in the format used by RTC dependency build to calculate dependency impacts
        Since:
        6.0.1

      • createProperty

        IScdProperty createProperty(java.lang.String namespace,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          IScdPropertyValue value)
        Create an SCD property.
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace of the property; must not be null and be a valid URI (see RFC 2396) and must end with "/"
        name - The name of the property; must not be null
        value - The value of the property; must not be null
        Returns:
        An IScdProperty
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if required arguments are null
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the property is a read-only property. See SCM_NAMESPACE.
        Since:
        6.0.1

                              java.lang.String name,
                              IScdPropertyValue value)
        Create an SCD scan property. Scan properties are deleted at the beginning of the RTC scan process when a file is scanned and will be replaced by new properties created during scanning.
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace of the property; must not be null and be a valid URI (see RFC 2396) and must end with "/"
        name - The name of the property; must not be null

        Returns:
        An IScdProperty
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if required arguments are null
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the property is a read-only property. See SCM_NAMESPACE.
        Since:
        6.0.1
